title: Video contest
body:
Thank you to everyone who entered their work into the In Rainbows /Aniboom video contest. Thanks also to those people who took the time to view and vote for their favourite animation.

From the 900 entries submitted, there is now a shortlist of 13.

The band will be picking the winner in the next month; Aniboom will award the winner a $10,000 prize to produce a full-length music video.

You can view the shortlisted animations here between now and then - and give them your own rating if you wish.

Happy viewing
